definition.zh_def: 發佈或寄送的行為，通常指在社交媒體或郵件中分享信息或內容。
definition.en_def: To send or publish something, often referring to sharing information or content on social media or via mail.
definition.example: She decided to post a photo of her vacation on Instagram.
